scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, seated and draped in a blue mantle, holds the Christ Child on her lap. She is surrounded by several angels. Two angels on the left are playing musical instruments, one a viol and the other a harp. Two more angels on the right are also playing instruments, one a harp and another a lute. Two additional angels are depicted above, seemingly holding a golden drapery behind the Virgin and Child. The background features a decorative gold and patterned textile. The scene is set against a blue-green ground.
